com.soa.transport.http.deploy.impl
Class SimpleHttpContext

java.lang.Object
  com.soa.transport.http.deploy.impl.SimpleHttpContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.osgi.service.http.HttpContext, org.springframework.osgi.context.BundleContextAware
public class SimpleHttpContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.osgi.service.http.HttpContext, org.springframework.osgi.context.BundleContextAware

A general-purpose implementation of HttpContext that can be used in a Spring context to provide basic support for publishing bundle resources. The implementation has a default mimetype mapping for context, and can be initialized to retrieve resources from any location in the declaring Bundle.

Method Detail

getMimeTypes

protected javax.activation.FileTypeMap getMimeTypes()

setMimetypes

public void setMimetypes(java.util.Map mimetypes)
Set the mimetype to use for content types of the resources. This is entirely optional, there is a sensible set of defaults.

Parameters:
mimetypes - A Map with mimetypes as values indexed by files suffixes for each content type. Internally, matches are case-insensitive so there is no need to include, e.g. { "html" : "text/html", "HTML" : "text/html" }.

setPrefix

public void setPrefix(java.lang.String prefix)
Set the prefix to place before any paths provided to getResource(String).

Parameters:
prefix - The prefix to use. This is the path within the bundle that holds the content. Defaults to /META-INF/resources.

setBundle

public void setBundle(org.osgi.framework.Bundle bundle)

setDefault

public void setDefault(java.lang.String defaultResource)
Set the name of the default resource to return if the path passed to getResource(String) is null or "/".

Parameters:
defaultResource - The full location of the default resource, e.g. /META-INF/resources/index.html.
